update jd_category
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_level = #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_leaf = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BIT},
components_id = #{componentsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_order = #{categoryOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_properties = #{categoryProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jd_category set category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_level = #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_leaf = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BIT}, components_id = #{componentsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_order = #{categoryOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_properties = #{categoryProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select d1.*from jd_category d1 where d1.product_id=#{prdId} AND d1.parent_id=#{parentId} AND d1.is_show=1 and is_deleted = 0;
select d1.*from jd_category d1 where d1.product_id=#{prdId} AND d1.parent_id=#{parentId} and is_deleted = 0;
select d1.*from jd_category d1 where d1.parent_id=#{parentId} AND d1.is_show=1 and is_deleted = 0;
select d1.*from jd_category d1 where d1.parent_id=#{parentId} and is_deleted = 0;

select category_id "id", category_name "text", parent_id "parentid", category_level "level", is_leaf "isLeaf", is_show "isShow" from jd_category where product_id = #{prdId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0

from jd_category where product_id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0

select
from jd_category where product_id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and category_id <> #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0

from jd_category where product_id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0
select isnull(max(category_id + 1), 1) as maxcategoryId from jd_category
select isnull(max(category_order + 1), 1) as maxcategoryOrder from jd_category

select
from jd_category where parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0
